TableView.name: vwAuthorizedPermissions
TableView.userDefinedSQL: -- Permissions assigned to the Role w/o context SELECT p.Id as PostID, null as ContextOrgID, rp.PermissionId FROM Post p INNER JOIN Role r on p.RoleID = r.Id INNER JOIN RolePermission rp on r.Id = rp.RoleId Where rp.RequiresContext = 0 UNION -- Permissions assigned to the Role with context SELECT p.Id as PostID, p.OrgUnitID as ContextOrgID, rp.PermissionId FROM Post p INNER JOIN Role r on p.RoleID = r.Id INNER JOIN RolePermission rp on r.Id = rp.RoleId Where rp.RequiresContext = 1 UNION -- Permissions assigned to the Role with context of decendent organiza.ons SELECT p.Id as PostID, dorgs.Decendent as ContextOrgID, rp.PermissionId FROM Post p INNER JOIN Role r on p.RoleID = r.Id INNER JOIN RolePermission rp on r.Id = rp.RoleId INNER JOIN [USMC].[Ext_MCRISS_vwDecendentOrgs] dorgs on p.OrgUnitID = dorgs.Parent Where rp.RequiresContext = 1 UNION -- Permissions assigned to the POST SELECT PostID, OrgUnitID as ContextOrgID, PermissionId FROM PostPermission
